summary: A third girl has just been murdered during the holiday season. Commissioner Rousseau does not believe in the serial killer hypothesis about which newspapers love to fantasize. At the same ... See full summary »
cast: Patrick Chesnais|Camille Panonacle|Brigitte Catillon|Grégory Fitoussi|Gérald Laroche|Bruno López|Thomas Coumans|Michel Bompoil|Christiane Millet|Vincent Jouan|Frédéric Duff-Barbé|Christophe Rouzaud|Juliet Lemonnier|Jean Miez|Tadrina Hocking|Thomas Arnaud|Daravirak Bun|Clément Parmentier|Frédéric Piatti|Christophe Thuillier|Jane Birkin|Fabrice Colson
title: Hiver rouge
